A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst film in the series. Just a bad film in general though as well. Too little exposition\, constant forced humor that ruins any serious momemt\, and a complete lack of respect for common sense physics laws. I loved 7\, and rogue one\, maybe i had too high of hopes for 8\, but right now i feel like i just wasted 3 hours of my life... at least my expectatations for another Disney Star Wars is finally lowered.
